column1: Since I have very sensitive skin, I am careful about the products that I use on my skin. This is a wonderful product since it addresses many of my skin concerns. I live in Las Vegas so my skin gets dried out under the relentless sun. In addition, I have fair skin so I worry about getting sunburns and sun damage. This is a great product because I did not have any negative reactions after applying it on and I was able to apply makeup over it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is wonderful. Feels great on the skin not greasy at all, it moisturized my skin great, not sticky feeling like a lot of SPF products, all in all I am very impressed and pleased with this product. Also there is not much of a smell or fragrance which is wonderful with face products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
